title: Instant Reactions to ‘The Last Dance’ Episodes 1-2 | The Ringer NBA Show
description:
Chris Ryan and Sean Fennessey convene for a special recap of ESPN's new Michael Jordan documentary, 'The Last Dance.' Episodes 1-2 bring us back to the beginning, where Michael Jordan was a fresh young face at the University of North Carolina. What memories did the documentary evoke, and what were the moments that gave us goose bumps?
Hosts: Chris Ryan and Sean Fennessey

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
